snippet.title: The Last Worker | Announcement Trailer | Official Selection 78th Venice Film Festival
snippet.description:
Subscribe: http://bit.ly/WIREDsub​
Wishlist: https://bit.ly/398Gvzy

Wired Presents: The Last Worker.

Revealed as part of WIRED DIRECT 2021, The Last Worker is a first-person narrative adventure centered around our struggle in an increasingly automated world. Combining a handcrafted art style with uniquely immersive gameplay mechanics in an epic setting, The Last Worker delivers an emotional, thought-provoking and comedic story packaged with rich characters performed by an all-star cast.

https://www.thelastworker.com

The Last Worker © 2021 Oiffy. Published by Wired Productions Ltd and developed by Wolf & Wood. The Last Worker and The Last Worker logo are trademarks of Oiffy.  All rights reserved.

Official Selection 78th Venice Film Festival #VeniceVRExpanded
